---
title: "Country Analysis: India"
---

Analyzing how life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population change over time in India.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

country = "India"
country_df = df[df["country"] == country]

plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["life_expectancy"], marker='o', label="Life Expectancy")
plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["gdp_per_capita"], marker='o', label="GDP per Capita")
plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["population_millions"], marker='o', label="Population (millions)")

plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.title(f"Trends in {country}")
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
